mapper.insert: insert into onlinebookstore.book (Bimage, Bprice, Bname, Btype, Sid, Bauthor, Bpublisher, Bpublishdate, Bsalednum, Bcommentnum, Boriprice, Bversion, Bpagenum, Bwordnum, Bprintdate, Bsize, Bpaperstyle, Bprintnum, Bpackage, Bisbn, Bcontentsummary, Bauthorsummary, Bmediacomment, Btastecontent, Bstocknum, Buploaddate) values (#{Bimage}, #{Bprice}, #{Bname}, #{Btype}, #{Sid}, #{Bauthor}, #{Bpublisher}, #{Bpublishdate}, #{Bsalednum}, #{Bcommentnum}, #{Boriprice}, #{Bversion}, #{Bpagenum}, #{Bwordnum}, #{Bprintdate}, #{Bsize}, #{Bpaperstyle}, #{Bprintnum}, #{Bpackage}, #{Bisbn}, #{Bcontentsummary}, #{Bauthorsummary}, #{Bmediacomment}, #{Btastecontent}, #{Bstocknum}, #{Buploaddate})
mapper.select: select b.Bid bid,b.Bimage bimage,b.Bprice bprice,b.Bname bname,s.Sname sname,b.Bsalednum bsalednum,b.Bcommentnum bcommentnum from onlinebookstore.book b ,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Sid=s.Sid order by rand() limit 8

select b.Bid bid,b.Bimage bimage,b.Bprice bprice,b.Bname bname,s.Sname sname,b.Bsalednum bsalednum,b.Bcommentnum bcommentnum from onlinebookstore.book b,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Sid=s.Sid and ( Bname like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Bauthor like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Bpublisher like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Sname like concat('%', #{key}, '%')) order by ${refer} limit ${PageSize*(pageNow - 1)} , #{PageSize}

select b.Bid Bid, Bimage, Bprice, Bname, s.Sid Sid, Sname, Bsalednum, Bcommentnum, Bauthor, Bpublisher, Bpublishdate, Boriprice, s.Stransprice Stransprice, Sactivity, Bversion, Bpagenum, Bwordnum, Bprintdate, Bsize, Bpaperstyle, Bprintnum, Bpackage, Bisbn, Bcontentsummary, Bauthorsummary, Bmediacomment, Btastecontent,s.Sicon Sicon from onlinebookstore.book b,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Bid = #{bid} and b.Sid=s.Sid limit 1
select b.Bid ,b.Bimage ,b.Bprice ,b.Bname , s.Sid,s.Sicon, s.Sname ,b.Boriprice from onlinebookstore.book b ,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Sid=s.Sid and b.Bid = #{Bid}

select count(*) from onlinebookstore.book b,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Sid=s.Sid and ( Bname like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Bauthor like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Bpublisher like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or Sname like concat('%', #{key}, '%'))
select b.Bid ,b.Bimage ,b.Bprice ,b.Bname , s.Sid,s.Sicon, s.Sname ,b.Boriprice from onlinebookstore.book b ,onlinebookstore.shop s where b.Sid=s.Sid and b.Sid = #{Sid}
mapper.update: update onlinebookstore.book set Bimage = #{Bimage}, Bprice = #{Bprice}, Bname = #{Bname},Bsalednum = #{Bsalednum},Bcommentnum = #{Bcommentnum}, Bauthor =#{Bauthor},Bpublisher = #{Bpublisher},Boriprice = #{Boriprice}, Bversion = #{Bversion},Bpagenum = #{Bpagenum},Bwordnum =#{Bwordnum}, Bsize = #{Bsize},Bpaperstyle=#{Bpaperstyle},Bpackage=#{Bpackage}, Bisbn =#{Bisbn},Bcontentsummary=#{Bcontentsummary},Bauthorsummary =#{Bauthorsummary}, Bmediacomment = #{Bmediacomment},Btastecontent=#{Btastecontent} where Bid = #{Bid}
